org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.jsr223

Interface Customizer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BindingsCustomizer, ConsoleCustomizer, ImportCustomizer, ScriptCustomizer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBindingsCustomizer, DefaultImportCustomizer, DefaultScriptCustomizer, LazyBindingsCustomizer

    public interface Customizer
    The Customizer provides a general way to provide configurations to a GremlinScriptEngine. This is an "internal" interface that acts as a marker and should not be implemented directly. Those wishing to write a Customizer should use one of its sub-interfaces, like ImportCustomizer
    Author:
    Stephen Mallette (http://stephen.genoprime.com)
